Sentencas: This paper focuses on a research on the influence of nickel content in zirconia matrix and its impact on the mechanical properties of obtained composites.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of ZrO2/Ni composites

Sentencas: ZrO2/Ni mixed powders were uniaxially pressed and sintered in a nitrogen atmosphere to obtain ZrO2/Ni composites that were characterized by X-ray diffraction (XRD), scanning electron microscope (SEM), and energy-dispersive X-ray spectroscopy (EDS).
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of ZrO2/Ni composites

Sentencas: The stereological analysis allows obtaining information about the size distribution of zirconia grains in the sintered composites.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of ZrO2/Ni composites

Sentencas: Relative density, hardness, fracture toughness, and bending strength were also analyzed.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of ZrO2/Ni composites

Sentencas: The results revealed that the presence of Ni particles in the composites affects the mechanical properties of the materials.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of ZrO2/Ni composites

Sentencas: An increased Ni concentration caused a decrease in Vickers hardness and increased the fracture toughness of the ZrO2/Ni composites compared to the ZrO2 samples.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of ZrO2/Ni composites

Sentencas: This kind of composite is of interest for temperature and flow sensors, thermal barrier coatings for gas turbines and supersonic propulsion systems of spacecrafts, as well as as a material for anode in solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of ZrO2/Ni composites
